살인마하면 생존마들한테 티배깅에다가 손전등 맞고 생존자 놓치고 겨우 따라가서 눕히고갈고리에 걸려고 들었는데  칼찌에 따라갔는데  발전기 다 돌아가서 아드터지면 멘탈도 같이 터짐  생존마하면 노매너 캠핑 준구 메질러한테 쳐 맞고 식구 말려죽이기에 빨려주지도 않은 모기 식구한테 묘비로 즉처 당함 솔직히 게임 혼자하기 싫어서 다인큐 돌리면 살인마들이 지들이 캠핑해서 한명 죽여놓고 다인큐 병신이라면서 욕한다 어이없는인성 망치기 게임 

이렇게 말해놓고 다들 계속 데바데 하고 있잖아 안 그래? 솔직히 메튜메튜 하면서 다 재밌어서 계속 하고 있잖슴 

그러니까 제발 메튜 나무 좀 수정해줘 메튜 빡빡이야
хочу чтобы новый маньяк леди Димитрэску

В этой игре есть все!. Мало того, что ты можешь играть за выживших или убийц, так в игре еще есть симулятор рыбалки. Берешь Бубу, вешаешь червя, (выжившего) на крючок в подвале, и становишься за угол с коварством. И ждешь пока рыбка клюнет. 10 игровых симуляторов из 10.

Game is full with bugs and glitches on a regular basis.

Very repetitive and is full with toxic players.

The way i continue to play makes me feel like i have Stockholm syndrome

10/10 would recommend getting face camped to be farmed off hook again.

Edit 13/10/21:
This new MMR system sucks and bhvr is still wondering why we complain about match making.

For an example:
Queuing into completely new players with less then 100 hours because they escaped a trial and the game thinking that they should be put with competitive players.

This is why we cant have nice things.

Also cosmetic sets shouldn't be a thing, Just let me put that long Felix hair with the ski suit.

Pas fini, mériterait de redevenir une alpha. Full bug (sons, hitbox, skins, en fait a peu près rien n'est fini correctement); développeurs arrogants (qui ne connait pas mathieu cote ?), et communauté qui pue la m*rde.

Aurait du potentiel si les devs voulaient enfin être fiers de leur travail, mais il semblerait que c'est un concept inconnu de cette boite.

Graphismes qui pourraient être mieux, on est ne low quality de base.

Il était très bien a une époque, mais il a perdu a être connu, et maintenant on en est là. Si je ne l'avais pas connu depuis le début, j'y jouerait pas aujourd'hui.

A fuir.

So, for me playing a game is all about the enjoyment. So when a close friend of mine suggested I try it, I found very quickly that I enjoyed it. So I have to date, almost bought every DLC of this game.

I personally really enjoy playing as The Killer, because well, there's just something knowing that I'm not "being that person". 

Although the game can be VERY toxic (as either a Killer or Survivor ) but overall , I really really love this game and I'm actually quite sad to see it dying. But hey, maybe it'll have a sudden rebirth and a massive influx of players will come in.

I hope to see you on the hook.

You get to play killer against four toxic survivors 2/3 matches. 10/10 would play again.

I've played this game over 8 different updates. 

I have not seen a game with a worse balancing system.

Everything good gets buffed. Everything bad gets nerfed.

Buffs to anything "bad" are useless. While every nerf makes things awful.

Dead by daylight at it's core is a fun game. The base idea of it. But the way the game was handled makes me wish I was playing old DBD. I don't want to come off as one of those "I miss the old days" people. But MMR has ruined playing killer for me. Before you would get in even matches, with good survs if you were good, and bad survs if you are bad. But now, no matter what I do, I am going against juke masters, sweats, toxic mfs, etc. Even on killers I have no time on, killers that are level 5, even the killers who I play for the first time. I am cracked on Blight and Bubba, and I feel as if I am forced to only play them because it's what wins. But I enjoy varity, I don't have mains.  The rank system means nothing, you aren't put with people your rank. I could log on, be at killer rank 20, and be against a team of golds. 

Devs please fix your game. 

Edit 1: (Sadako Rising) This update has been the best one in recent memory. The most recent killer has 3 helpful and good perks, the killer is fun, and they didnt make survivors god awful with broken perks again. But it seems as if playing killer is a chore now. Nothing fun in it. 

The only fun I had in the last 4 months of this game were custom games with people who can have fun.

Edit 2: (6th Anniversary) I've returned somewhat and have had mixed results. Playing the new killers still puts me in some higher skill lobbies, but I'm evening out my results to some consistencies. I think the game could improve but from the dev logs and what has already changed I will be turning this review into recommended. This is most definitely subject to change however.

Edit 3 (Roots of Dread Midchapter post Announcement): No more dead hard thank the lord.

Хорошая игра, чтобы проводить время с друзьями. Так же если вы одиночка и любите охотиться, нежели убегать - это игра для вас. Для любителей хоррора - игра порадует лицензионными убийцами, такими как Майкл Майерс, Аманда Янг (свин), Крик, а так же кошмар - он же Фредди Крюгер.
